title: Shocks for the Chalet School
description: PRE-ISBNFrom the back cover:“The Chalet School is preparing for a new term on St Briavel’s Island when shock number one arrives! Emerence Hope has been sent all the way from Australia – and there’s no doubt that she’s going to be a trial!Shock number two comes from Canada – Jo has had twins! And when Miss Everett is literally swallowed up by the earth, a new mystery unfolds itself – and Emerence is tangle in it.”
author: Elinor M. Brent-Dyer
